summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Roy Street, in the City of Seattle, from Second Avenue North to Fifth Avenue North, by regrading the same and by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with all necessary wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 542 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
